description: This Rajalakshmi Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless beauty. The combination of high-quality diamonds, rubies, and emeralds, set in rich 22K gold with a Hyderabadi polish, makes this piece a true heirloom. The detachable pendant offers versatility in styling, allowing you to adapt the necklace to different occasions. The combination of modern and traditional elements ensures it will be cherished for generations.
